text: Holiday Inn is a brand of hotels. Holiday Inn is one of the world's most recognized hotel brands. It is part of the InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG). Kemmons Wilson had the idea for the business after a family road trip to Washington, D.C.. During the trip, he was disappointed by the quality of roadside motels at that time. Mr. Wilson partnered with Wallace E. Johnson to build the first four motels on roads entering Memphis, Tennessee. Eddie Bluestein was the architect who designed these first hotels. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Holiday Inn Hotels review Category:American hotel chains Category:Companies based in Atlanta Category:1952 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Tennessee
title: Holiday Inn
